articles.author: Michelle R. Smith
articles.title: Vaccine effort turns into slog as infectious variant spreads - Medical Xpress
articles.description: As cases tumble and states reopen, the potential final stage in the U.S. campaign to vanquish COVID-19 is turning into a slog, with a worrisome variant gaining a bigger foothold and lotteries and other prizes failing to persuade some Americans to get vaccinat…
articles.content: by Michelle R. Smith As cases tumble and states reopen, the potential final stage in the U.S. campaign to vanquish COVID-19 is turning into a slog, with a worrisome variant gaining a bigger foothold … [+7629 chars]

articles.title: "Ring of Fire" Solar Eclipse Dazzles Skies of North America, North Pole - The Great Courses Daily News
articles.description: A near-total solar eclipse shone down on parts of North America Thursday. Solar eclipses occur in stages and show us rare parts of the Sun.
articles.content:
By Jonny Lupsha, Current Events Writer
A total eclipse takes place through a series of five stages: first contact, second contact, totality, third contact, and fourth contact. Photo By IgorZh / Shut… [+2989 chars]

articles.author: Joan Verdon
articles.title: Prime Day Spending Expected To Top $11 Billion, Adobe Predicts - Forbes
articles.description: Americans will outspend Cyber Monday and Black Friday online totals during next week's Prime Day event, the Adobe Digital Economy index predicts.
articles.content: The Adobe Digital Economy Index is forecasting that Prime Day-related e-commerce spending will ... [+] exceed $11 billion this year. (Photo Illustration by Omar Marques/SOPA Images/LightRocket via Ge… [+3927 chars]
